DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , open label , multicenter , Phase 2 study compare two dose schedule Telintra patient Low Intermediate-1 risk MDS . Patients least 18 year age present histologically confirm Low Intermediate-1 risk MDS document significant cytopenia least two month IWG criterion eligible .
DOC.brief_title: Phase 2 Study Comparing Two Dose Schedules Telintraâ„¢ Myelodysplastic Syndrome ( MDS )
DOC.criteria: Primary de novo MDS Low intermediate1 MDS ECOG performance status 0 1 Documented significant anemia without neutropenia and/or thrombocytopenia Adequate kidney liver function Patients must discontinue hematopoietic growth factor least 3 week prior study entry Prior allogenic bone marrow transplant MDS History MDS IPSS score great 1.0 Pregnant lactate woman Any severe concurrent disease , infection , comorbidity , judgement investigator , would make patient inappropriate study entry Oral steroid e.g . prednisone > 10 mg per day History active hepatitis B C Known history HIV
